Actions.Name: Toad
Actions.Description: A character in range 6 is transformed into a frog. Remove that character from the battlefield and replace them with a 1 hp frog summon. When the frog is defeated, return the target to the battlefield. Until the frog is defeated, they cannot take a turn. The Hob can destroy the frog as a free action. It can be targeted by any character.

Summons.Name: Frog
Summons.SummonActions: Hops 1 space in a a direction of the hob's choice, then spends the rest of the turn croaking.
